subtitle: there was a theory of crustal
displacement that speculates that the
entire crust of the earth shifts every
twenty thousand to thirty thousand years
and that only eleven thousand six
hundred years ago large parts of
Antarctica were ice-free many
conspirators actually believe the theory
of crustal displacement they also think
that such part of the South Pole was Ice
free and it was where the lost city of
Atlantis was located many satellite
images of the continent have revealed
some strange structures beneath the
massive blocks of ice many authors
believe that there are secrets in the
land that are hidden from the public
several images have come up in the last
couple of years they showed what looks
like highly massive structures in fact
many of these Frozen monuments were
compared to some Majestic structures
today like the Pyramids of Giza some UFO
Hunters and authors believe that such
oddly shaped formations are only some of
the many pieces of evidence that point
to the fact that the continent was once
home to an ancient civilization
